Metadata.title: Keep&Store - Store with Security
Metadata.description: Keep&Store is a reliable solution for securely storing passwords, files, and notes with the ability to import and export data. Ensure the safety of your information with two-factor authentication and access settings.
Metadata.keywords: password storage, import from Excel, export to Excel, file storage, structuring, archiving, two-factor authentication, file sharing, notes, notifications
